text:
Good afternoon,
Is there a way to add the new UI extension's cards to a view at installation of the app ?
It seems adding the card must be done manually which is pretty strange since the old cards used to appear on the right panel directly after app install.
Am i missing something obvious here ?
Is this the only beta i need to apply for for public app ui extensions?

Mine used to also add automatically to a view, and now they don't -  which is actually better for me... as i can add it to my own filtered view / somewhere obscure people won't look at first, for final checks before rolling out to everyone else :melting_face:
We’re very interested in doing this too and think it would help us deliver a great experience for our shared customers.
